item.title: Sex, drugs, violence, and My Little Pony
item.author: Samuel Flynn,
item.description: Half way through its second season, Felix has yet to review My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic. Shame. The oddly popular TV series based on the line of Hasbro toys has gained immense popularity since it debuted in 2010, spawning an entire subculture of fans older than the target demographic, known â€¦
